title: Himi 15
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Na’e ha’u mo Sīsū
‘A e lotu lelei
Pea ‘oku kau totonu
Ki he laumālie.
2.
Ko e toki lotu
‘Oku ‘aonga lahi,
Ki he kakai angahia
Ke nau mo’ui ai.
3.
‘Oku ne fakahā
Ki he angahala,
‘A e tokonaki ‘ofa
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
4.
Na’a ne foaki
‘A Sīsū totonu
Ko e hifo mahu’inga
‘I he’etau hia.
5.
Ko e unga’anga
Ki he halaia
Pea ‘ata’atāina
Pea faingofua.
6.
Lotu kia Sīsū
Pea ‘amanaki
Ki he fakamolemole
Pea mo e liliu. *
